content:
the mandatory disclaimer given by the police before he starts questioning a suspect
the disclaimer:
	-you have the right to remain silent
	-anything you say can be used against you in court
	-You have the right to an attorney. If you cannot afford an attorney, one will be provided for you

this also stretches this right against self-incrimination from the police all the way to the jury

any evidence gained after one pleads to remain silent is tossed
